title: Otis McDonald Discography [MP3] (2 Albums + 1 Single + CoverArt)
description:
Did my best to compile all the music of Otis McDonald. This guy makes amazing electronic remix music. Considering there is no clear place to support him financially and all of his works are available through his soundcloud, I thought i'd just compile it for the torrent. Music is in mp3 at 128kbps (the quality they were on sound cloud, I believe).


Album Art and Metadata should be set correctly


A description of Otis McDonald:

"Shuggie Otis and Michael McDonald inspired SF/Bay Area based producer, Joe Bagale, to write a song. A couple of Mondays later, they inspired an Identity.
His name is Otis McDonald. His mission: Music
Otis Mac's tracks have been downloaded over 5 million times exclusively through the YouTube audio library, and already have appeared in thousands of people's videos. It might be the best music nobody has ever heard. Funny how the business works."


His soundcloud:


Anyways, please check this guy out! Specifically, I recommend "Scarlet Fire"
